parameters.query: SELECT id, receipt_id, created_at, retry_count, max_retries, vlm_model_used FROM receipt_processing_jobs WHERE (status = 'pending' OR (status = 'failed' AND retry_count < max_retries)) AND (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM receipt_processing_jobs WHERE status = 'running') < 3 ORDER BY priority ASC, created_at ASC LIMIT 1

=UPDATE receipt_processing_jobs SET status = 'running', started_at = NOW(), worker_id = 'n8n-queue-monitor' WHERE id = '{{ $json.jobId }}' AND (status = 'pending' OR (status = 'failed' AND retry_count < max_retries))
=UPDATE receipts SET processing_status = 'processing', updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = '{{ $node['Prepare Job'].json.receiptId }}'

=UPDATE receipt_processing_jobs SET status = 'failed', completed_at = NOW(), error_message = '{{ ($json.error || $json.message || "HTTP " + $json.status_code + " response").replace(/'/g, "''") }}', retry_count = retry_count + 1 WHERE id = '{{ $node['Prepare Job'].json.jobId }}'; UPDATE receipts SET processing_status = 'failed', updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = '{{ $node['Prepare Job'].json.receiptId }}'
